** a chapter
.
\chapter{A Chapter}

Then the text follows.
\chapter{A Chapter}
Then the text follows.
.
<h1 id="sec-1"><div>Chapter 1</div>A Chapter</h1>
<p>Then the text follows.</p>
<h1 id="sec-2"><div>Chapter 2</div>A Chapter</h1>
<p>Then the text follows.</p>
.


** a chapter and a section
.
\chapter{A Chapter}

\section{Here starts a section}

Then the text follows.

\chapter{A Chapter}\section{Here starts a section}
Then the text follows.
.
<h1 id="sec-1"><div>Chapter 1</div>A Chapter</h1>
<h2 id="sec-2">1.1 Here starts a section</h2>
<p>Then the text follows.</p>
<h1 id="sec-3"><div>Chapter 2</div>A Chapter</h1>
<h2 id="sec-4">2.1 Here starts a section</h2>
<p>Then the text follows.</p>
.


** section inside a macro - correct visual appearance to be done with CSS
.
Start with \emph{some \section{A Section}} text.

Then more text follows.
.
<p>Start with <em>some<h2 id="sec-1">1 A Section</h2></em> text.</p>
<p>Then more text follows.</p>
.
